docTitle.titlePart: Study of cosmic ray muons momentum and charge asymmetry spectra

byline.docAuthor:
V. Sharma
1,
*, K. Saraswat, V. Singh
1 and V. S. Subrahmanyam
1

byline.affiliation: 1 Department of Physics, Banaras Hindu University,

front.div:
In this article, we studied cosmic ray momentum and charge asymmetry spectra. Data were collected using India-based
Neutrino Observatory prototype Iron Calorimeter (ICAL) working at VECC in Kolkata. Results presented in this article
are drawn from the data taken during initial phase of the data taking.
